org.apache.tapestry.wml
Class Deck

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.tapestry.spec.BaseLocatable
      org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent
          org.apache.tapestry.BaseComponent
              org.apache.tapestry.AbstractPage
                  org.apache.tapestry.wml.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
IComponent, ILocatable, ILocationHolder, IPage, IRender
Direct Known Subclasses:
WMLException, WMLStaleLink
public class Deck
extends AbstractPage

Concrete class for WML decks. Most decks should be able to simply subclass this, adding new properties and methods. An unlikely exception would be a deck that was not based on a template.

Since:
0.2.9
Version:
$Id$
Author:
David Solis
